BadgeDetail.Name: Salon Management - Manage Sales
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they understand the legislative requirements relating to sales. They can leverage key communication channels to support sales and develop a staff training plan and target chart to increase sales.

Task.Title: Sales strategy
Task.Body: Upload your sales strategy showing how your approach to sales. Include your communications and staff training plan and a sample sales target chart.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload your sales strategy showing how your approach to sales. Include your communications and staff training plan and a sample sales target chart.
Task.TextileBody: Upload your sales strategy showing how your approach to sales. Include your communications and staff training plan and a sample sales target chart.
